lead_paragraph: The appointments created rival centers of power and elevated the voice of Mr. Bannon, whose longtime website, Breitbart News, has traded in conspiracy theories and sometimes racist messages.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear and Alan Rappeport reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, MAGGIE HABERMAN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Choices on Top Advisers Split Power in 2
headline.main: Donald Trump Picks Reince Priebus as Chief of Staff and Stephen Bannon as Strategist

snippet: The appointments created rival centers of power and elevated the voice of Mr. Bannon, whose longtime website, Breitbart News, has traded in conspiracy theories and sometimes racist messages....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump appoints Republican National Committee chairman Reince Priebus to be White House Chief of staff, and alt-right media provocateur Stephen K Bannon as senior counselor and chief West Wing strategist; appointments set up competing centers of power in Trump's government, handing power to both political insider and fringe firebrand.
